Publication Title: Flux sampling in genome-scale metabolic modeling of microbial communities
Publication Keywords: Cell metabolism, Microbial communities, Genome-scale Metabolic Modeling, Flux Sampling
Publication Authors: Patrick E Gelbach, Handan Cetin, Stacey D Finley
Publication Abstract: Background: Microbial communities play a crucial role in ecosystem function through metabolic interactions. Genome-scale modeling is a promising method to understand these interactions and identify strategies to optimize the community.
